#summary Building Personal Cash Flow

= Windows =

  # install Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 Express (or above) [http://www.microsoft.com/express/Downloads/]
  # install wxWidgets [http://www.wxwidgets.org/]
  # compile wxWidgets [http://wiki.wxwidgets.org/Microsoft_Visual_C%2B%2B_Guide] (DLL Release & Debug)
  # checkout
    * cppunitlite
    * pacommon
    * pacommon-test
    * pcfbase
    * pcfbase-test
    * pcfui
    * sqlite3
    * pcf-msvc
  # download SQLite [http://www.sqlite.org/]
    # copy `sqlite3.h`, `sqlite3ext.h` and `sqlite3.c` to the above _sqlite3_ folder
  # edit project properties for _pcfui_
    # C/C++ --> General --> Additional Include Directories
      * `<WXPATH>\include`
      * `<WXPATH>\include\msvc`
    # Linker --> General --> Additional Library Directories
       * `<WXPATH>\lib\vc_dll`
  # build _pcfui_
  # make sure the following files are in the path
    * `wxmsw[291ud]_core[_vc_custom].dll`
    * `wxbase[291ud_vc_custom].dll`
    * `wxmsw[291ud]_adv[_vc_custom].dll`
    * `wxmsw[291ud]_html[_vc_custom].dll`
